code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PriceList=_ref=>{let{title,items,type}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:type==='group'?'price-list group':'price-list pt',children:items.map((item,index)=>{if(type==='group'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"count",children:item.count}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:`price ${item.regularPrice?'type1':''}`,children:[item.regularPrice&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"regular-price",children:item.regularPrice}),item.price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"right-info",children:[item.labels.map((label,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`label-box ${label.color}`,children:label.text},idx)),item.limit&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"limit",children:item.limit})]})]},index);}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"left-info",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"count",children:item.count})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"right-info",children:item.types.map((typeItem,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"line",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price-type",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"pt-type-label",children:[idx+1,":1 PT"]})," ",typeItem.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"price-detail",children:typeItem.detail})]},idx))})]},index);}})})]});};export default PriceList;
